name: Sento Evolved
description:
Note from the Dev: 

Hey what's up guys! This is my fighting game Sento Evolved. I made it for mobile and thought why not port to web gl for itch. This works with some controllers on some web browsers. Enjoy!

Menu: Space bar

Movement: wasd

Moves: tyughj

This game supports online multiplayer and 15 different languages.

The legendary mobile fighting game Sento Evolved is here with intense visuals, non stop action, a crazy list of fighting warriors, shredding music and massive combos!

Battle other fighting players online or test your skills against the story mode.

Sento Evolved has begun!
Fighters from all over the galaxy have gathered for the ultimate fighting competition.
The Sento Evolved Champion is granted one magic wish by the dark council.
This centuries tournament will be held in the streets. Will you be this centuries fighting champion?
